biography:
Antonio St. James caught the acting bug early on in life, with his first role in the high school production, "Othello". Over the past decade, he has starred in a number of stage plays, commercials, television dramas and short films. His 2010 short film, "OSI", caught the attention of St. Louis' very own News Channel: CBS 4, for their "Stop the Violence" segment and has also won several accolades. To add to the credits of his other films, he has also starred in "The Makings of You", with legendary screen actress, Sheryl Lee and Jay R. Ferguson, of "Mad Men" fame, along with a small role in David Fincher's suspenseful-drama, "Gone Girl", and recently on NBC's "Chicago PD".

Mr. St. James can also add singer to his repertoire; formally being a member of the Gospel group, Psalms 100.  - IMDb Mini Biography
name: Antonio St. James
